contentrichtext.text: '''[[Moonie (nickname)|Moonie]]''', a family name in the [[United Kingdom]], is used as a [[nickname]] for members of the [[Unification Church]] and is sometimes considered offensive in that use although not usually in others. '''Moonie''' may also refer to: *[[Moonie, Queensland]], town in Australia *[[The Moonies]], British rock band *[[Otto Miller (catcher)]] or Moonie, American baseball player *[[Brendan Moon]] or Moonie, Australian rugby player *[[Keith Moon]] or Moonie, rock and roll drummer *Moonie, character in ''[[New Waterford Girl]]'' *Moonie, character in comic book series by [[Nick Cuti]] *Moonie, fan of the anime series ''[[Sailor Moon]]'' ==Surname== *[[Moonie (surname)]] *[[Mooney]], Irish surname, sometimes spelled "Moonie" ==See also== * [[Moonie River]], river in Australia * [[Moonie Highway]], road in Australia * [[Mount Moonie]], mountain in Antarctica * [[Super Moonies]], German pop band * [[Moony]], Italian musician * [[Moon Knight]], Marvel Comics character, nicknamed "Moonie" by fans * [[Mooning]], the act of displaying one's bare buttocks by removing clothing {{disambiguation}}
